Hello Pierre-Jean,

 

Kindly find attached an excel file containing raw sugar data and two pivot tables one for exports and one for imports.

it contains a query to fetch the latest data from the platform all you have to do is click the refresh button. And you should have the latest data available.




 

I hope this helps you find what you are looking for.

 

Please let us know your thoughts and if you would like us to adjust anything we will be preparing the white sugar file and send it to you as well

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

Thank you!

 



 

Thank
